summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby to Tazia Smith, with copies sent to Jay Lipman and Paul Morris. It discusses the JPMorgan statements for Southern Trust and Southern Financial, indicating a plan to discuss further actions regarding these statements.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the sender of the email, discussing JPMorgan statements.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is the primary recipient of the email regarding the JPMorgan statements.

persons.name: Jay Lipman
persons.context: Jay Lipman is copied on the email, indicating involvement in the discussion about the statements.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is also copied on the email and is mentioned as someone Amanda will discuss the statements with.

keyFacts: The email discusses JPMorgan statements for Southern Trust and Southern Financial.
Amanda Kirby plans to discuss the statements with Paul Morris after his meeting.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
